advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Whatever you love, the official app for “the front page of the internet” puts it all at your fingertips. Browse and post across thousands of communities, and explore your own history to see where you reaped all that sweet karma.

If you’re always on the go, Inshorts keeps you up to date on global affairs—no views or bias, just pure facts. Compiling breaking news from reliable Indian and international sources, including Reuters, The Indian Express and The Guardian, this app delivers concise reports in 60 words or fewer. Stay in touch with current events and the latest Bollywood, entertainment and sports news, in Hindi or English. Personalise your feed with stories that matter to you, getting more of the facts you need, in a slick, digestible format. There’s a sea of information out there—Inshorts gives you all the headlines you need.
